title: Mountain Vista
description: A breathtaking view from the alpine trails, where the sky meets the peaks.

title: Forest Path
description: Ancient trees line the misty path through old-growth forest.

title: Alpine Sunrise
description: First light breaking over the volcanic giant, painting the glaciers gold.

title: Valley Mist
description: Morning fog rolling through the temperate rainforest valleys.

title: Summit View
description: The reward after a long climb - endless peaks stretching to the horizon.

title: Starlit Peaks
description: The Milky Way arching over snow-capped summits on a clear winter night.
